title: Things to do in Singapore
text:
Things to do in Singapore Christina Pfeiffer | 24th Jul 2015 4:29 PM Christina Pfeiffer Cool Singapore. Photo: Singapore Tourism Board Popular Stories   
Singapore has come a long way since the days when most of us thought of the city state as "boring". These days, most travellers who break their journey will agree there's plenty to do in Singapore. 
From shopping and eating to visiting Singapore Zoo and wandering around Chinatown or Little India, Singapore is not a bad spot to spend a few days. 
Here's my list of 12 things to do and places to go in Singapore . Do you have any more suggestions?
